outputs.output_descr: Given the multiple systemic, organizational and human resource capacity needs to meet the EU accession standards, capacity development is a critical subject for analysis and public debate at this time, and could have a significant impact on the policy choices made today and in the coming years. The NHDR intends to serve as an analytical tool in assessment and promotion of more effective capacity development in the country.

project_descr: NHDR on Capacity Development in Albania.
